archimate:Principle.name: DP06- Incentives and synergies between data space participants
archimate:Principle.documentation:
This design principle aims to foster synergies among participants, leading to mutual benefits such as monetization and value generation. It provides guidelines for creating synergies and incentivizing engagement, laying the groundwork for the business and data value creation enablers building blocks of the data space blueprint.
Core concepts: Incentive structures and models, collaboration, mutual benefits and shared value creation
Best Practice. To ensure the effectiveness of the incentive model, employing the business model radar can help to develop a collaborative business model. Balancing the effort to join the data space with the value retrieved is crucial, as is defining transparent business models and implementing profitable use cases. Monitoring these use cases ensures equitable value creation and distribution, while clear accounting mechanisms and growth strategies promote sustainability.
